bibl.title: Menander, The Bad-Tempered Man, or The Misanthrope. Translated by Ph.V. Foreword by Christopher Fry.
bibl.seg: Vellacott Philip, Menander, The Bad-Tempered Man, or The Misanthrope. Translated by Ph.V. Foreword by Christopher Fry.
C.R. par W.G. Arnott, JHS 83 (1963) pp. 169-170. - J.W. Halporn, CJ 58 (1963) pp. 234-235. - F.H. Sandbach, CR N.S., 12 (1962) p. 92. - E.W. Whittle, CP 57 (1962) pp. 137-138.
